channel.title: Life on Iman Tumorang
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Iman Tumorang

item.title: The Hardest Part of Being a Non-Native Speaker of English
item.description: This path is too risky, but there are no other shortcut. Writing is one of my hobby since I was still in high school. But write an English story is merely new for me. I started writing an English article/story since a year ago. TLDR: This is my personal story Don’t expect a great story, because I’m on my way to improve myself. My Way in Writing I still remember, a few years ago.

item.title: What I Learn from Working in Small Startup as A Fresh Graduate
item.description: Hey , my name is Iman Syahputra Situmorang, a Fullstack Software Engineer in Bornevia. I just start working for 6 months. A valuable 6 months to learn what is the feel when working in a small Start Up . Well it will be a shocking news, about the closing of bornevia.com. But I will not telling anything about the reason of bornevia’s closing, I’m just telling what I learn from Bornevia when I work over there.
